revised_title: Investigating the Unique Optical Properties of Oxalate of Chromium and Potash
tldr: The author examines the unique optical properties of oxalate of chromium and potash, including its powerful double refraction, color differences in images formed by double refraction, and its specific action on a definite red ray in the spectrum. These properties have significant implications for the study of optics and the measurement of refractive powers of other materials.
